item.title: Please help meeee PLEASEEE
item.dc:creator: @demps2k9 demps2k9
item.description:
@demps2k9 wrote:

Nope.

Change it to this:

if(c.isDonator == 1) for(int i : donItems) if ((wearID == 773 || wearID == 9906 || wearID == 15041 || wearID == 10760) && (c.playerRights < 3 )) {c.sendMessage("This is an Owner only item."); return true; }

After that change the donator rights in the character file to 1. That’s for donator.

For owner do:

if(c.playerRights == 3) for(int i : donItems) if ((wearID == 773 || wearID == 9906 || wearID == 15041 || wearID == 10760) && (c.playerRights < 3 )) {c.sendMessage("This is an Owner only item."); return true; }

Read full topic

item.title: Please help meeee PLEASEEE
item.dc:creator: @callmedragon callmedragon
item.description:
@callmedragon wrote:

I need someone to help me fix some bugs on my server through teamviewer these are
Trade bug cannot move after accepting trade
Someone to teach me how to edit how items are equipped and add player rights
Thanks guys

This is what my player rights for items says just tell me what to change please
if(c.isDonator == 3)
for(int i : donItems)
if ((wearID == 773 || wearID == 9906 || wearID == 15041 || wearID == 10760) && (c.playerRights < 3 )) {c.sendMessage(“This is an Owner only item.”);
return true;
}
